title: teemo icon?
body: I beat the doom bots twice when do I receive the icon?

replies.body: Yup, as long as you weren't a leaver you'll be set for an icon!  Keep in mind per the [announcement ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/the-teemoing-2016)page, that we won't be done sending out the icons until our current aim of the 17th.  Some may get it before others, but hang tight until then!
